extension.category: Detects incorrect or questionable semantic constructs for elements in a DataLib diagram.
Detects modeling constructs that would result in invalid generated OpenDDS code.

constraints.constraint: not self.name.oclIsUndefined() and self.name <> '' Struct names should not be empty Struct name is empty

constraint.name: Array size not greater than zero

constraints.constraint: self.length > 0 Array size should be greater than zero Array size should be greater than zero

constraint.name: Array not connected to a Type

constraints.constraint: not subtype.oclIsUndefined() Array should connect to a Type Array should connect to a Type
not self.name.oclIsUndefined() and self.name <> '' Typedef name should not be empty Typedef name is empty
not self.name.oclIsUndefined() and self.name <> '' Field names should not be empty Field name is empty
not self.name.oclIsUndefined() and self.name <> '' Union names should not be empty Union name is empty
self.branches->notEmpty() Union does not connect with any Branches Union does not connect with any Branches

not switch.oclIsUndefined() and ( switch.oclIsTypeOf(Int) or switch.oclIsTypeOf(Enum) or switch.oclIsTypeOf(Boolean) or switch.oclIsTypeOf(Char) or switch.oclIsTypeOf(WChar) )
Union must connect with a switch (discriminator) Type of an integral, Boolean, Char, or Enum type Union does not connect to the correct Type for its switch
cases->notEmpty() Union Branch does not connect to any Cases Union Branch does not connect to any Cases
not literal.oclIsUndefined() and literal <> '' Union Case does not have have literal defined Union Case does not have have literal defined
